author: guitargeek
body:
#### PR description:

Implement fillDescriptions() for producers in RecoParticleFlow/PFSimProducer to address issue https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/29449 and merge `.h` files with `.cc` files in RecoParticleFlow/PFSimProducer/plugins.

#### PR validation:

CMSSW compiles, local matrix tests pass.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

No backport intended.
title: Implement fillDescriptions() for producers in RecoParticleFlow/PFSimProducer
